title: Grid Template Columns
description: Grid template columns defines the columns of the grid with a space-seperated list of values

title: Grid Template Rows
description: Grid template rows defines the rows of the grid with a space-seperated list of values

title: Grid Column Grid Row
description: Grid column/Grid row is the shorthand for grid-column-start/end and grid-row-start/end

title: Grid Template Areas
description: Defines a grid template by referencing the names of the grid areas which are specified with the grid-area property
code snippet: header header main main footer footer

title: Column Row Gap
description: Column and row gap specifies the size of the grid lines
